author: jstrachan
msg: reordered the module list a little to remove duplicates and order them so its easier to see if things are missing etc - added the new modules

author: jstrachan
msg: added an initial spike created while flying to Austin of a simple POJO based service engine which dispatches message exchanges to POJOs (beans). Currently works with plain POJOs or allowing some form of annotations to be used to describe how to map from the MessageExchange to the POJO methods and parameters. Still work in progress but shows the kinda things we could support

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed author information from all the files of the "appserver" component: keeping this information in source files is discouraged by the ASF (clearer information about the contributors of a file can be derived from the commit logs).

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed author information from all the files of the "base" component: keeping this information in source files is discouraged by the ASF (clearer information about the contributors of a file can be derived from the commit logs).

msg: Few updates to get WSA addressing submission working correctly
